newsitem.title: POLAND: Agros new issue priced at PLN 65-80/shr.
newsitem.headline: Agros new issue priced at PLN 65-80/shr.

text.p: The price range for book-building for a public offering of 2.425 million shares of Agros Holding SA food trader and producer was set at 65-80 zlotys per share, the issue's lead manager said on Monday.
"The initial range for the book-building is set at 65-80 zlotys," Pawel Tamborski, the head of the primary market division at Creditanstalt Securities SA, told a news conference.
The offering is scheduled for March 20-26.
